references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
mathematica: Tan[ x/Cosh[ x ] ] (* Odd Part *)nn = 20; Table[(CoefficientList[Series[Tan[x*Sech[x]], {x, 0, 2*nn+1}], x] * Range[0, 2*nn+1]!)[[n]], {n, 2, 2*nn, 2}] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Feb 16 2015 *)
author: _R. H. Hardin_, _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Simon Plouffe_
